b-tech-in-cse.summary: The Department of Computer Science and Engineering at NIET is known for its excellence in computer engineering education with the highest package and 100% placement record. As one of the leading B Tech CSE colleges in Delhi NCR, the department has a strong tradition of producing producing high-quality professionals and a significant presence in the software industry both in India and abroad, department has established itself as a leader in the field. The department is at the forefront of cutting-edge research and the delivery of state-of-the-art education.

b-tech-in-cse-regional.summary: The four-year B.Tech programme at NIET in Computer Science & Engineering Regional is the epitome of high-class specialization. For Computer Science Regional, NIET is definitely the best place to study. Students may become a part of the tradition of excellence, and, with rapidly evolving technology and the continuous need for innovation, the department is in the process of producing quality professionals.

btech-cs.summary: Niet offers an under-graduate honours course (b.tech) in Computer Science with specialisation in Cloud Computing which deals with the theoretical foundations of computation and practical techniques for their application. B.Tech Computer Science is a course for students who are interested in adopting cloud resources or frameworks as their field of study or who want to gain hands-on practical experience to improve their competitiveness in the cloud job market. Cloud computing technology is used across the world.

b-tech-in-it.summary: The IT sector is exceptionally diverse and continues to grow. IT professionals often move between professional specializations as their interests and expertise change. A work-focused IT degree allows you to choose from a wide range of career options in software development, computer programming, business analysis, data modeling, systems integration and network management.

btech-ece.summary: The Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering, approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA), New Delhi was established in the year 2001. The Department offers a Bachelor’s program with an initial intake of 120 and a Master’s program in VLSI Design with an intake of 09 students each. The labs though well-equipped and the infrastructure, are regularly upgraded not only to serve the purpose of the curriculum prescribed but also to facilitate the carrying out of innovative projects to challenge the fast-changing needs of the society besides undertaking R&D activities.

b-tech-in-vlsi.summary: VLSI, or Very-Large-Scale Integration, is a branch of electronics engineering that deals with the design, fabrication and manufacturing of chips or integrated circuits (ICs) that contain a very large number of transistors. The field of very-large-scale integration (VLSI) in India is currently experiencing rapid growth and development. There has been a significant increase in the number of companies and research institutions working in this area.

b-tech-in-me.summary: Mechanical engineers need to play a vital role in the development, operation and manufacturing of new machines, devices, and processes to benefit humankind. They need to apply their creative imagination and professional skills in different situations. The Department of Mechanical Engineering imparts technical knowledge to the students, nurtures their problem-solving skills and involves them in the innovation of modern technologies.

btech-biotechnology.summary: At Department of Biotechnology, we are dedicated to providing a cutting-edge Biotechnology course that prepares students for exciting careers at the intersection of biology, technology, and innovation. Our Biotechnology program is designed to equip students with the knowledge, skills, and practical experience necessary to thrive in the rapidly evolving field of biotechnology. Our Biotechnology course offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers a wide range of topics, including molecular biology, genetics, biochemistry, microbiology, and bioinformatics.

b-tech-in-cse-data-science.summary: B.Tech Data Science at NIET at NIET , a four-year under-graduate B.Tech program in Data Science has been specifically designed to provide a platform to undergraduate students for a prospective career in upcoming data science industry. The course encompasses Data Science as an interdisciplinary, problem-solving approach that learns to apply scientific techniques to practical problems. It is an intensive skill-oriented program with enough practical training for building business models for analytics.

btech-aiml.summary: NIET offers a four-year under-graduate B.Tech course in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning which aims to develop a strong foundation by using the principles and technologies that consist of many facets of Artificial Intelligence including logic, knowledge representation, probabilistic models, and machine learning. This course is best suited for students seeking to build world-class expertise in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and emerging technologies which help to stand in the crowd and grow careers in the upcoming technological era. The course is designed to give the students enough exposure to the variety of applications that can be built using techniques covered under this program.

b-tech-in-cse-cyber-security.summary: NIET offers a four-year under-graduate B.Tech course in Cyber Security which aims to develop a strong foundation that will allow students to learn comprehensive approaches to protect infrastructure including data and information. Cybersecurity plays pivotal role in today’s information era. The demand for security and privacy of data is growing with each passing hour as effectiveness of a business relies on real time secure processing of data.

b-tech-in-csbs.summary: NIET in partnership with India’s leading IT Service and Consulting Company, TCS, is offering a four-year specialized B.Tech course titled “Computer Science and Business Systems” to cater to the rising need of engineering talent with skills in technology. This state-of-the-art course aims to impart knowledge of cutting-edge technologies and business skills with hands-on exposure to make students industry-ready. The main goal of this course is to make sure that the students not only know the core topics of Computer Science but also develop an equal understanding of humanities, human values, and management sciences.

btech-iot.summary: Internet of Things (IoT) is an interdisciplinary program which has its application enormously increased in the past few years since it has a vast scope of usage. IoT generally refers to a growing network of internet-connected devices that find various applications in engineering and sciences. When objects are interconnected across the world, it allows people or things using those objects to be connected anytime.

btech-in-cse-artificial-intelligence.summary: NIET offers a four-year under-graduate Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) with a specialization in Artificial Intelligence (AI) is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of both computer science principles and advanced AI techniques. This program aims to equip students with the skills and knowledge necessary to develop intelligent systems, algorithms, and applications that can solve complex problems across various domains. Artificial Intelligence (AI) enables machines to learn from experience, when used they adjust with different inputs and perform tasks like a human.

mathematics-and-computing.summary: The B.Tech in Mathematics and Computing with Specialization in Quantum Computing is a four-year undergraduate honours program that equips students with the strong mathematical foundation, computational expertise, and quantum technology skills required to excel in the emerging quantum industry. The quantum computing sector is poised to transform industries such as cryptography, pharmaceuticals, artificial intelligence, finance, and scientific research. With the demand for skilled quantum computing professionals growing rapidly worldwide, graduates of this program will be well-prepared to build successful careers in this groundbreaking and evolving field.

bca.summary: Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology, An Autonomous Institute, coming up with the popular course among students of India - Bachelor of Computer Application 3 years course with high demand all over the IT sector. This program is one of the top choices in BCA colleges in Greater Noida, (Delhi NCR) for students seeking a strong foundation in computer applications. The program is streamlined to meet the challenges in the IT industry.

bba.summary: Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology, an Autonomous Institute, offers a highly sought-after Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) program. This 3-year course is designed to equip students with essential business and management skills, preparing them for dynamic roles in the corporate world. The program includes globally recognized certifications to enhance career prospects.

b-tech-cse-artificial-intelligence-inter.summary: Make your Academic Journey Truly International! NIET offers an AICTE approved International Twinning program for the students. The program is based on institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships which help in broadening the scope of the educational program by providing opportunities for enhanced learning and an affordable access to the students aspiring to pursue higher studies with a global exposure.

b-tech-cse-artificial-intelligence-and-m.summary: Make your Academic Journey Truly International! NIET offers an AICTE approved International Twinning program for the students. The program is based on institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships which help in broadening the scope of the educational program by providing opportunities for enhanced learning and an affordable access to the students aspiring to pursue higher studies with a global exposure.

b-tech-information-technology-internatio.summary: Make your Academic Journey Truly International! NIET offers an AICTE approved International Twinning program for the students. The program is based on institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships which help in broadening the scope of the educational program by providing opportunities for enhanced learning and an affordable access to the students aspiring to pursue higher studies with a global exposure.

b-tech-computer-science-engineering-inte.summary: Make your Academic Journey Truly International! NIET offers an AICTE approved International Twinning program for the students. The program is based on institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships which help in broadening the scope of the educational program by providing opportunities for enhanced learning and an affordable access to the students aspiring to pursue higher studies with a global exposure.

btech-mechanical-engineering-working-pro.summary: The Working Professional in Mechanical Engineering for UG (B. Tech.) course offered by the School of Mechanical Engineering at Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology in Greater Noida is designed to cater to the needs of individuals already engaged in the workforce seeking to enhance their skills and knowledge in the field of mechanical engineering. This program provides a comprehensive curriculum that covers fundamental principles as well as advanced topics in mechanical engineering, ensuring that students gain a deep understanding of core concepts and emerging trends.

btech-electronics-communication-engineer.summary: The Working Professional in Electronics Engineering for UG (B. Tech.) course offered by the School of Working Professional in Electronics Engineering for UG (B. Tech.) course offered by the School of Electronics Engineering at Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology in Greater Noida is designed to cater to the needs of individuals already engaged in the workforce seeking to enhance their skills and knowledge in the field of Electronics engineering.

minor-degree-in-aiml.summary: The Minor Degree in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AIML) offers students an in-depth understanding of AI and ML technologies, their applications, and their impact on society. The program provides hands-on experience with industry-standard tools and techniques, equipping students with the skills needed to pursue careers in fields such as data science, AI engineering, and robotics. Graduates with a Minor Degree in AIML are well-equipped for careers in a variety of industries, including healthcare, finance, e-commerce, and more.

m-tech-in-cse.summary: An Autonomous Institute Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology offers the PG Course M. Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering /Computer Science/ Information Technology and related branches. As a leading M.Tech in Computer Science colleges, the course is offered by the Department of Computer Science & Engineering by highly qualified and experienced faculty members.

mtech-mechanical-engineering-working-pro.summary: The Working Professional in Mechanical Engineering for PG (M. Tech.) course offered by the School of Mechanical Engineering at Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology in Greater Noida is uniquely tailored to address the demands of Industry 4.0, the era characterized by the integration of advanced technologies into manufacturing and production processes. This program emphasizes cutting-edge topics such as automation, robotics, artificial intelligence, and cyber-physical systems, which are at the forefront of the Industry 4.0 revolution.

mtech-ai.summary: This M.Tech program is meticulously designed to offer in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience in the core and advanced areas of artificial intelligence. Our objective is to equip postgraduates with a robust understanding of AI's foundational theories and cutting-edge technologies, empowering them to spearhead innovation and leadership in the ever-evolving AI landscape. Through rigorous training, students will be prepared not just to participate in the current technological trends but to redefine them, emerging as influential leaders who drive progress and efficiency in the AI sector.

mtech-in-electronics-communication-engin.summary: The future of VLSI (Very Large Scale Integration) design promises an experiential journey of innovation and transformation, fuelled by an array of emerging technologies and evolving design methodologies. As the demand for higher performance, lower power consumption, and increased functionality continues to soar, VLSI designers are embracing novel approaches such as advanced process technologies, 3D integration, and heterogeneous computing architectures to push the boundaries of chip design. Today, AI-driven design automation tools and methodologies are revolutionizing the way circuits are conceived, optimized, and verified, paving the way for unprecedented levels of design productivity and efficiency.

mtech-biotechnology.summary: At Department of Biotechnology, we are dedicated to providing a cutting-edge Biotechnology course that prepares students for exciting careers at the intersection of biology, technology, and innovation. Top colleges for M.Tech in Biotechnology our Biotechnology program is designed to equip students with the knowledge, skills, and practical experience necessary to thrive in the rapidly evolving field of biotechnology. Our Biotechnology course offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers a wide range of topics, including molecular biology, genetics, biochemistry, microbiology, and bioinformatics.

mca.summary: The Master of Computer Application course was formed in the year 2001, is approved by AICTE, New Delhi, and affiliated to Dr. Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. and Computer Industry with world-class talent and creates some of the finest software professionals every year.

mba.summary: The MBA program is designed for ambitious professionals looking to elevate their careers, gain cutting-edge business knowledge, and develop leadership skills that make a real impact in the global business landscape. At NIET, we offer a comprehensive curriculum, industry-driven, innovative, and experiential learning for the holistic development of management graduates. Postgraduates from NIET are highly desirable job candidates because they are self-directed, ethical, and effective contributors in their communities.

mba-innovation-entrepreneurship-venture-.summary: MBA-IEV program designed for the leaders and visionaries of tomorrow, imparting the skills and knowledge to help them start their own business and grow it successfully. This program allows them to convert great ideas into scalable and sustainable businesses. Through our rigorous curriculum, students gain the knowledge and frameworks to build and lead strong, enduring organizations.

mtech-electronics-communication-engineer.summary: The Working Professional in Electronics Engineering for PG (M. Tech.) course offered by the School of Electronics Engineering at Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology in Greater Noida is uniquely tailored to address the demands of Industry 4.0, the era characterized by the integration of advanced technologies into manufacturing and production processes. This program emphasizes cutting-edge topics such as automation, robotics, artificial intelligence, and cyber-physical systems, which are at the forefront of the Industry 4.0 revolution.

mba-marketing-and-finance.summary: MBA in Marketing and Finance is a dynamic and interdisciplinary program designed to develop expertise in two critical business domains. This course equips students with strategic decision-making skills, financial acumen, and marketing insights, preparing them for leadership roles in global businesses. This program is ideal for aspiring professionals looking to excel in both financial and marketing domains, ensuring versatility and adaptability in today’s dynamic business landscape.

m-tech-in-me.summary: A Master of Technology (M.Tech) in Mechanical Engineering is a postgraduate program offering a comprehensive study of advanced mechanical engineering principles and applications. The curriculum typically dedicated towards Industry 4.0, covering fundamental topics like materials science, alongside specialization tracks in areas such as manufacturing engineering, robotics, or renewable energy. Elective courses allow students to tailor their studies to their interests, while a significant research component, including thesis or dissertation work, provides hands-on experience and fosters innovation.

bca-mca-integrated.summary: Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology, An Autonomous Institute, coming up with the popular course among students of India - Master of Computer Application (Integrated), 5 years integrated course with high demand all over the IT sector. The programme is streamlined to meet the challenges in IT industry. Students get to learn from the basic to advanced technologies that are currently in demand.

bba-mba-integrated.summary: NIET is offering a five-year Integrated BBA MBA program, approved by AICTE and AKTU, designed with a cutting-edge curriculum that primarily focuses on catering the industry demand, developing globally ethical, intelligent, and culturally agile students ready to take the challenges of 21st century. This program enables the students to become business-ready managers and entrepreneurs with the ability to respond complex challenges of business environment. School of Management is offering a five-year program affiliated with AICTE and AKTU, is designed to meet the business requirements of future with unique learning experience, cutting edge curriculum.

btech-mtech-integrated.summary: The five-year M.Tech Integrated (B.Tech + M.Tech.) programme at NIET in Computer Science & Engineering is the epitome of high-class specialization. Students are groomed by giving them a strong background in advanced studies in Computer Science & Engineering. The programme is designed to provide a seamless transition from a Bachelor's degree to a master's degree, typically completed in a five-year duration.

advance-diploma-in-automotive-mechatroni.summary: This is skill development initiative (Vocational Training) by Mercedes- Benz Academy, India and the institute. The intention of this collaborative vocational program is to produce skilled automotive professionals who can repair and maintain the high end luxury cars and they are conversant with latest automotive technology.

international-twinning-program.summary: Make your Academic Journey Truly International! NIET offers an AICTE approved International Twinning program for the students. The program is based on institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships which help in broadening the scope of the educational program by providing opportunities for enhanced learning and an affordable access to the students aspiring to pursue higher studies with a global exposure.
